oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on May 27, 1997 with ‘Uthmān Aḥmad Fā‘ūr, male, born in 1920 in Firʻim, Palestine. He was a teacher.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع عثمان أحمد فاعور في 27 أيار مايو عام 1997، ذكر، ولد عام 1920 في فرعم، فلسطين. كان أستاذاً.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Political turmoil during the British rule. (@ 40:44)
British detention camps in Palestine during the mandate. (@ 69:55)
